game.name: Soul Essence
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A frantic, race-against-time survival horror game with Roguelite and Metroidvania elements. Traverse a decrepit, cultist-infested estate and collect awakened souls to conquer an ancient god looking to feast on your essence. Before midnight strikes—can you defeat the god or prevent its return?
